name: My Difficult Brain: #1 Clothes
description:
My Difficult Brain: #1 Clothes

(Fullscreen reccomended // the intro music is supposed to be quiet)

Short game about dealing with weird anxieties, OCD and about fear of everyday routine of putting on clothes before getting out. 

Code, art, field recordings from my apartment by me
Background song is a muffled loop of Benz Truck by Lil Peep
